name: A thief utility belt
data: It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration a bit.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'steal'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'pick locks'.
- Extra -
The user can store/extract lockpicks with a command 'lockpick store'
and 'lockpick extract'.
The user can store/extract empty vials with a cmds 'vial store' and
'vial extract'.
The user can store/extract mortar with 'mortar store' and 'mortar
extract.
The user can store/extract pestle with 'pestle store' and 'pestle
extract.'
The user can store/extract wax with 'wax store' and 'wax extract'.
Due to the magical nature of the belt the items inside becom
e weightless.
The items inside the belt will save over chesting.
The belt modifies the skill 'pick locks'.
The belt modifies the skill 'steal'.
